title: LittleSnitch 2.0.5i
description:
Little Snitch is a software firewall that protects your computer against unwanted guests from the Internet. But who protects your private data from being sent out? Little Snitch does!

The regularly version of Little Snitch is available in English and German localization. This international version contains a number of additional translations.

---------------
Thanks to Punks4Live:
 in Little Snitch Configuration you have to set 2 new rules befor entering the serial.
(by clicking new button in the

A.) 1.) click new
2.) choose "deny connections" in the first line
3.) As Application, select Library -> Little Snitch -> Little Snitch UIAgent.app
4.) leave the rest as it is.
5.) apply

B.) 1.) once again, click new
2.) choose "deny connections" in the first line
3.) Leave "All Applications" as it is
4.) in the serverline, you choose "hostname"
5.) Enter "obdev.at" in the adress line
6.) The IP will be confirmed: 80.237.144.65 one line below
7.) leave the rest as it is.
8.) apply

and now you can enter the serial which comes with this zip file..
